data.oai_dc:dc: Climatic data for all localities (including latitude and longitude) extracted from WorldClim database at 30 second resolution for 60 species from Tree 2 in Spriggs et al. [2] for each climatic variable (MAT = mean annual temperature, Bio1, TMAX = maximum temperature of the warmest month, Bio5, TMIN = minimum temperature of the coldest month, Bio6, MAP = mean annual precipitation, Bio12). Note that temperature values are in degrees Celsius*10 and precipitation values are in mm/year.
